name: Numerators of the partial sums of the reciprocals of the number of unitary divisors function (A034444).
reference: Jean-Marie De Koninck and Aleksandar Ivić, Topics in Arithmetical Functions, North-Holland Publishing Company, Amsterdam, Netherlands, 1980. See pp. 42-43.
Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants II, Cambridge University Press, 2018, p. 50.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Jean-Marie De Koninck and Jacques Grah, Arithmetic functions and weighted averages, Colloquium Mathematicum, Vol. 79. No. 2 (1999), pp. 249-272.
formula: a(n)/A383056(n) = (c/sqrt(Pi)) * n / sqrt(log(n)) + O(n / log(n)^(3/2)), where c = A345288 (De Koninck and Ivić, 1980).
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 15 2025
